name: Artist's Block
description:
A young art student attempts to fight off artist's block in the middle of her latest project. Help her overcome this tough situation and help her create some dope pieces that stand out.

A visual novel made with TyranoScript. I created this for my Digital Cultures and Narrative class at UCF. Enjoy :)

CONTROLS:

Enter = Proceed game text

Space = Skip text

A = Auto mode

C = Save game

X = Load game

L = Display text log

Z = Open menu
